appName: Echoes of the Asylum: Horror Escape Room
displayName: Echoes of the Asylum: Horror Escape Room
display_name: Echoes of the Asylum: Horror Escape Room
display_long_description:
Trapped in a cursed asylum, every room hides puzzles, secrets, and horrors that react to your presence. In Echoes of the Asylum: VR Horror Escape, you’ll solve, survive, and uncover the nightmare that wants you forever.

Whispers follow you. Shadows move when you’re not looking. And something deep within these halls doesn’t want you to leave.

Built for full-room VR on Meta Quest, Echoes of the Asylum blends psychological terror with escape-room puzzles to immerse you in a living nightmare.

You awaken in a derelict asylum with no memory of how you got there. To survive, you must explore its haunted corridors, collect clues, and unlock its twisted past. Every recording, every locked door, every ghostly echo brings you closer to freedom — or madness.

🎮 Key Features

Immersive VR horror escape gameplay built for Meta Quest

Psychological terror and paranormal threats — more than jump scares

Multi-layered puzzle solving with exploration across the asylum

Discover chilling audio logs that reveal the asylum’s secrets

Unlock rooms, gather clues, and fight to escape before the asylum consumes you

🩸 This is more than a haunted building. It remembers. It watches. And it wants you to stay.

👉 Dare to escape? Download now and enter Echoes of the Asylum in VR.
